testcase.name: testStartCorrectly

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: The snake should begin in the top left, heading east, and be three cells long. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ --------------- OO>A.. | A..... ...... | ......
